Headline: Buses begin /end trips at Roosevelt Orange/Green Station
ShortDescription: NB3 King Drive buses end at Roosevelt Elevated station. SB buses begin their trip at Roosevelt Elevated station, & run SB on State St to Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses will end their trip Michigan/Roosevelt, due to congestion in the Loop, downtown.

Southbound buses will begin their trip at Roosevelt Orange/Green Line station, then run southbound on State Street to Cermak and resume their normal routing on Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Buses begin /end trips at Roosevelt Orange/Green Line Elevated Station
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jcksn Park Exp. buses will end their trip at Rsvlt elev. station. SB buses will run on State to 25th St, then enter the expway to continue via DuSable/LSD.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses will end their trip at the Roosevelt Orange/Green Line Elevated station, due to congestion in the Loop, downtown.

Southbound buses will operate southbound on State Street to 25th Street, before entering the expressway to continue their normal routing via Dusable/Lake Shore Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem with a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem with a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
